pl.myrecipebasket.service

Class RoleService

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.myrecipebasket.service.RoleService

  • @Service
public class RoleService
extends java.lang.Object
    Object RoleService is a intermediate layer between persistence layer (RoleRepository) and view layer. Contains all Role related business logic of MyRecipeBasket application.
    See Also:
    RoleRepository
